name: Where did I lose it?
description:
A small game created for my master's research project, a survey is linked at the end of the game. Which can also be accessed here: https://forms.gle/QKVyZ9sANGWnGd9b9

Please take the time to complete this if you can, thank you!

In game character models, character animations and foliage are from the Unity asset store.

The folder containing the game is currently 650 MB when unzipped.
